title: We attended the city\'s Christmas Parade last evening (Dec. 6) and thoroughly enjoyed it.  With four public high schools in our county, I was wondering why none of their marching bands participated in the parade.  That would have been a great addition.
text:
None of our local high school marching bands were in this weekend's

parade at parents' request, because of transportation difficulties

and prior commitments, according to New Hanover County Schools

spokesman Valita Quattlebaum.
